summary: An aspiring HR expert with a demonstrated history of working as Notary Public. Skilled in Human Resources, all legal matters, labor law, Notary law, communication and administration. Strong legal and business ground with Bachelor of Laws (L.L.B.) & Master of Business Administration - MBA focused in International Management from Wittenborg University of Applied Sciences Amsterdam campus.

profile_positions.description:
Scope:

- Real State: any property transaction such as documentation of properties by issuing title deeds
-Vehicles: registration of any transaction upon cars, trucks, Machinery etc. preparing paper work & issuing title deeds
-Power of attorney: preparing and registering any officials wills and related documents 
-Affidavits: preparing official document
-Certification: certifying copies of expression documents in accordance with the original ones
- Miscellaneous: preparing any types of contracts, drafting contracts, promissory notes, registering documents for foreign affairs and related subjects 

List of activities:

-	Witness the signing of official documents and verify the identity of the signees
-	Administering oaths and affirmations, maintaining notary journals, and managing various legal documents such as contracts, affidavits and loan documents
-	Witnessing legally binding signatures on documents
-	Affirming the state of mind of all signees
-	Identifying fraud or coercion at the time of signing or other official situation
-	Completion of the notarial certificate of all documents
-	Full responsibility for overseeing contracts and other official proceedings, ensuring compliance with legal requirements
-	‘’Attest the authenticity” of deeds and other legal documents for use abroad
-	Verifying and recording the identification of agreement participants
-	Creating a trusted and legally binding environment for individuals and organizations alike
-	Notarizations, Certifications, legalizations of documents such as Transfer of lands, Evaluation documents, Annulment of the agreement
-	Custodianship declaration, Statutory declaration, Consents, Good conduct, Professional staff identification and etc.
-	Commission of Oaths, Affidavits, Solemn Affirmation and declarations
-	Easement and rights of way
-	Certify true copies of documents
-	Business purchases and sales
-	Mercantile documents
-	Leases and assignments of rents

profile_positions.description:
Scope & Responsibilities: Solicitor and advisor in all legal, criminal and family matters, contracts,  business & international affairs and HR consulting
Participating in the primary courts and the Supreme Court sessions to submit a petition or complaint and also defend the rights of the clients and consequently implementation of definitive orders issued 
-	Providing legal support and guidance
-	Finding ethical solutions to legal matters
-	Communicating with clients to understand their legal concerns and needs to help provide them with essential pieces of advice
-	Enlightening clients about legal options and making them know the possible outcomes or threats
-	Preparing legal documents such as dispositions, pleadings and contracts in a timely and accurate manner
-	Preparing and filing documents with courts
-	Attending in the courtroom with trials and hearings
-	Conducting legal research and gather evidence
-	Ensuring that appropriate approvals are in place before documents are executed.
-	Drafting, reviewing, and negotiating a diverse range of agreements, and file comprehensive complaints and airtight responses
-	Appealing against the decision issued for consideration in the Supreme Courts
-	Follow-up and implementation of issued orders and closure of cases
